info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Extracts a subset of a bit array. It extracts a subset of 'size' bits from 'start' with a stride of 'step' bits.
[Parameters] - input data type : not used. - output data type : not used. - measure : input measure. - start : start index of the subset. Default value is 0. - size : number of bits to extract. Default value ('bit array length') specifies that the only limit on the number of bits is the measure length. - step : stride, that is, the 'bit distance' between extracted bits.
[Return type] Bit-array.
[Examples] Extract a subset of 10 bits from index 4 with a stride of 2 bits. oph_bit_subarray('','',bit_measure,4,10,2)
